caption: An elderly man and an elderly woman are in a house. The old lady is lying on the bed, drinking water. Suddenly, the old man clutches his chest in pain. Shortly after, an ambulance arrives, and the old man is carried onto it. The old man appears in a hospital, and a nurse hands him a bottle. He then goes to an office where a lady sits at a desk. After that, he enters another office where a man is seated. The old man goes to the yard and works on a large wooden board with his grandson. They return to a room and start looking at a photo album while conversing constantly.
